text:
Millicent Dolly May Small (6 October 1946 – 5 May 2020) was a Jamaican singer-songwriter. She was best known for her 1964 song "My Boy Lollipop". It reached number two in both the UK Singles Chart and the US "Billboard" Hot 100. She was born in Clarendon, Jamaica.
Small died on 5 May 2020 of a stroke in London, aged 73.
